home.name: I'm Aaron
home.personalDescription: Hello there! I’m a software engineer based in Mexico, passionate about building products using React JS/React Native and Node JS. Yeah!!, I ❤️ JavaScript. I also like sharing my ideas, thoughts and everything I've learned doing my job, so, don’t' forget to visit my
home.personalDescriptionTwo: If you’re thinking about creating the next big idea, you can
home.personalDescriptionThree: I'm sure we'll make a good team.
home.appDevDescr: Cross-Platform app development for Android and iOS.
home.fssWebDescr: Web application that allows the users create feature spaces
home.maasDescr: Mobile Apps Administration Site for International Markets
home.availabilityDescr: Aplicación web que permite crear espacios de ventas en tienda
home.fssAppDescr: Aplicación móvil que permite consultar los espacios de venta disponibles en tienda
home.contactDescr: Whether you have a business idea, a project in development or you need technical assistance, don't hesitate to contact me. I'm sure this could be the start of a great collaboration together!.
home.getBackText: I'll get back to you in 1-2 business days.
home.formError: Sorry I'm having issues delivering your message, please try again!
